index: the number associated with the region
name: long name of the region
mapping: mapping to bids label, see bids documentation
x: x-coordinate of the center of gravity of the region (mm)
y: y-coordinate of the center of gravity of the region (mm)
z: z-coordinate of the center of gravity of the region (mm)
n: the number of voxels in the region

network_label.Description: label of the network or widearea the region is part of

agg_name: list of the names of aggregated regions in the original atlas
